Footer.aboutUs: Since 2017, our company has been engaged in car and motorbike sales, trust sales, car management and trailer rental.

Home.Hero: Welcome to the Bek Auto-Motorbike website

About-us.title: About us
About-us.paragraph-1: At our company, we pride ourselves on bringing together a diverse group of experts in the automotive industry. Our team is composed of seasoned professionals who are passionate about cars and dedicated to providing the highest quality of service.
About-us.paragraph-2: Whether you're looking to buy a new vehicle, need repair services for your current one, or want to rent a trailer, we have the knowledge and experience to meet your needs.
About-us.paragraph-3: We strive to exceed our customers expectations and ensure their complete satisfaction. Join us on this journey and experience the difference we can make in your automotive journey.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.item-1-text: We offer a wide range of cars and motorbikes for sale. If you are interested in selling your vehicle, please contact us.
Services.item-2-text: We provide high-quality repair services for your vehicle. Please contact us for any vehicle repairs.
Services.item-3-text: We offer a wide range of trailers for rent as long as you need them. If you would like to rent a trailer, please go to the rental page or contact us.

Members.title: Our Members
Members.member-1-description: Roland is the founder and CEO of Bek Auto-Motorbike. He has been working in the automotive industry for over 10 years and has a passion for cars. He is dedicated to providing the best service possible to his customers.
Members.member-2-description: Roland is the founder and CEO of Bek Auto-Motorbike. He has been working in the automotive industry for over 10 years and has a passion for cars. He is dedicated to providing the best service possible to his customers.
Members.member-3-description: Roland is the founder and CEO of Bek Auto-Motorbike. He has been working in the automotive industry for over 10 years and has a passion for cars. He is dedicated to providing the best service possible to his customers.

Repair.title: OUR REPAIR SERVICES
Repair.name: Bek Auto-Motorbike
Repair.welcomeText2: , your trusted destination for all your vehicle repair needs. Our team stands ready to tackle any issue plaguing your vehicle. Whether it's a simple fix or a complex overhaul, we're here to ensure that your vehicle runs smoothly and safely. With our expert technicians and state of the art facilities, you can trust us to deliver top-notch service at competitive prices. Don't let vehicle troubles disrupt your day – contact us today and experience the difference firsthand.
Repair.projectTitle1: One of our projects gave us the opportunity to renovate an
Repair.feedback1: “I was very impressed with the quality of service I received from
Repair.feedback2: . The team was professional, courteous, efficient and fast. They were able to revive my bike and it's looks like a new one.”

Rent.truckDescription: Regularly serviced and maintained. Available for daily hire. Air conditioning, remote central locking, computer, multi steering wheel, hands free phone, cruise control, front window, front mirror.
Rent.cauction: Deposit required, VAT not included in the price.

Chat.description: If you have any questions, feel free to ask and we will answer as soon as we can!
